name: Lanternfly Man
description:
CONTROLS: 

Z to use weapon/interact
X to throw walnut
Esc for pause menu

In a long, forgotten corner of the world, in a peaceful village still filled with the old world's magic, the plant people of new Peatersburg spend their days basking in the sun, happily settled in their soil. But when the Lanternfly man swarmed their home, everything changed. 

Now it's up to their last hope, the Gardener, to confront the root of this evil and nip this needless destruction in the bud. 

TEAM: 

Producer/Level DesignerNikki (NikMacPattyWak)@nikmacpattwakComposerSasha (Senbie)ProgrammerMorgan (SmallMistake)https://smallmistake.itch.io/Environment/Logo ArtistMatejhttps://twitter.com/matlouisb
Character/Item ArtistMoaz
